name: Grottonaut
description:
This game is the result of a personal challenge.

I challenged myself to make a mobile game in 1 day, and this is the result. An endless runner of some sort.

Depending on the results out there on the wild internet, I'll consider continue the development. Donations will play a big role in the fate of this game.

Also, this is released as is. It may or may not run on your device.

Known issues:
- Installation on Android 9.
